Creates a new ConnectionConfigError with details about the validation failure.

<Note>
  `ConnectionConfigError` extends `BaseError`, see the docs for BaseError for
  all supported methods.
</Note>

## Import

import { ConnectionConfigError } from "@alchemy/common";

## Parameters

`string`
Optional details about the specific validation failure
